text.en: You vanquished the hordes of the māra of afflictions,2
text.en-trans: nyönmong dü kyi dé tsok chom

text.en: Endowed yourself with masses of merit and wisdom,
And transcended the limitations of saṃsāra and nirvāṇa.
text.en-trans: si dang zhiwé ta lé dé

text.en: To you, crown jewel of the Śākyas, I pray.
Please bless me to overcome the eight fears.3
May I attain an exceptional human body
text.en-trans: lar yang lhakpé lü tob né

text.en: And become a supreme guide for beings,
Freeing them from all their pain.
text.en-trans: depön chok tu dak gyur shok
